snippet: Texas’ two-year spending cycle gives greater regard to short-term political gain than to the long-term consequences of aborted educations.
lead_paragraph: Texas’ two-year spending cycle gives greater regard to short-term political gain than to the long-term consequences of aborted educations.

headline.main: When Letting Students Slip Away Looks Like a Budget Blessing
headline.seo: When School Dropouts Start to Look Like a Budget Blessing
headline.print_headline: When Letting Students Slip Away Looks Like a Budget Blessing
